channel.title: ::starter Command help!

item.title: ::starter Command help!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Here, use this.
Add this method into class PlayerHandler.

public HashSet getStarters() { return startSet; }
Add this with your command codes.

else if(command.startsWith("stater")) { if(server.playerHandler.getStarters()) { addItem(ID, AMOUNT); } else { server.playerHandler.getStarters().add(playerName.toLowerCase()); } }

Declare this in class PlayerHandler.
private HashSet startSet = new HashSet();

Read full topic

item.title: ::starter Command help!
item.dc:creator: @meowmix101 meowmix101
item.description:
@meowmix101 wrote:

why dosent this work?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); sendMessage("Heres the starter pack, go have fun!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You noob! You already got your starter pack!"); } }
